Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 71st overall pick, by Minnesota in 1992...
Injured on 6/21/1992 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/1/1993 with a Swollen Ear, out for one week...
Traded from Minnesota to Texas on 7/21/1995 (Going to TEX: RF D. Relaford. Going to MIN: 2B J. Vidro)...
Injured on 5/6/1996 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/21/1996, off William VanLandingham (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/20/1996, off Jeff Suppan (OAK)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1997...
Injured on 8/17/1998 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
